trans-unit.source: Allows control of code access security permissions.
trans-unit.target: 允許的程式碼存取安全性權限控制。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBase> class compares strings using ordinal sort rules and ignores the case of the strings being compared.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBase>類別比較字串時，使用序數排序規則，並且忽略要比較之字串的大小寫。

trans-unit.source: The following example inherits from the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBase> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會繼承<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBase>類別。

trans-unit.source: 4 kinds of constructors are implemented.
trans-unit.target: 會實作 4 種建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The example also provides an implementation of a class called `MailslotPermissionEntry`.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例也將提供的類別中實作`MailslotPermissionEntry`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBase.PermissionAccessType%2A> property is then privately set to the type of `MailslotPermissionEntry`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBase.PermissionAccessType%2A>屬性然後私下設定的型別`MailslotPermissionEntry`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBase.TagNames%2A> property is set privately to "Name" and "Machine".
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBase.TagNames%2A>屬性私下設為 「 名稱 」 和 「 機器 」。

trans-unit.source: for the right to control evidence.
trans-unit.target: 提供控制辨識項的權限。

trans-unit.source: Security action: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: 安全性動作： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlEvidence" />.
trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlEvidence" />。

trans-unit.source: When you inherit from <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBase" />, you must provide at least three constructors, set two properties, and provide a third property.
trans-unit.target: 當您繼承自<see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBase" />，您必須提供至少三個建構函式，設定兩個屬性，並提供第三個屬性。

trans-unit.source: The required constructors are: a default constructor, one that takes a <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" /> as a parameter, and as many as needed that take values for the properties.
trans-unit.target: 必要的建構函式： 預設建構函式，另一個則接受<see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" />做為參數，以及許多視需要採取的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The properties that need to be set are <see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBase.PermissionAccessType" /> and <see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBase.TagNames" />.
trans-unit.target: 需要設定的屬性是<see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBase.PermissionAccessType" />和<see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBase.TagNames" />。

trans-unit.source: The third property that is needed is one that returns the permission entries.
trans-unit.target: 需要第三個屬性是一個傳回的權限項目。

trans-unit.source: For an example of an implementation of this class, see <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterPermission" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需此類別的實作的範例，請參閱<see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterPermission" />。

trans-unit.source: In <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterPermission" />, the <see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBase.TagNames" /> property is set privately to "Machine" and "Category", the <see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBase.PermissionAccessType" /> property is privately set to the type of <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterPermissionAccess" />, and the <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterPermission.PermissionEntries" /> property returns the permission entries.
trans-unit.target: 在<see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterPermission" />、<see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBase.TagNames" />屬性私下設為 「 機器 」 和 「 類別目錄 」<see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBase.PermissionAccessType" />屬性公開設定的型別<see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterPermissionAccess" />，和<see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterPermission.PermissionEntries" />屬性會傳回權限項目。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBase" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBase" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBase" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBase" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBase" /> class with the specified level of access to resources at creation.
trans-unit.target: 使用建立資源時的指定存取權等級，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBase" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="state" /> parameter is not a valid value of <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="state" /> 參數不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBaseEntry" /> to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBaseEntry" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds a permission entry to the permission.
trans-unit.target: 將使用權限項目加入至使用權限。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the use of the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBase.AddPermissionAccess%2A> method to add a permission access entry during class initialization.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範使用<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBase.AddPermissionAccess%2A>方法，將在類別初始化的權限存取項目。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBase> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBase>類別。

trans-unit.source: The specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBaseEntry" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBaseEntry" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in the <see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBaseEntry.PermissionAccessPath" /> property is not equal to the number of elements in the <see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBase.TagNames" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBaseEntry.PermissionAccessPath" /> 屬性中的項目數目不等於 <see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBase.TagNames" /> 屬性中的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBaseEntry" /> is already included in the permission.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBaseEntry" /> 已包含於使用權限。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the character to be used to represent the any wildcard character.
trans-unit.target: 指定用來表示任何萬用字元 (Wildcard Character) 的字元。

trans-unit.source: The value of this field is "*".
trans-unit.target: 此欄位的值是"*"。

trans-unit.source: Clears the permission of the added permission entries.
trans-unit.target: 清除已加入的使用權限項目中的使用權限。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an identical copy of the current permission object.
trans-unit.target: 建立並傳回目前使用權限物件的相同複本。

trans-unit.source: A copy of the current permission object.
trans-unit.target: 目前權限物件的複本。

trans-unit.source: A copy of the permission object represents the same access to resources as the original permission object.
trans-unit.target: 權限物件的複本以原始的權限物件的資源表示相同的存取權。

trans-unit.source: The XML encoding to use to reconstruct the security object.
trans-unit.target: 用來重新建構安全性物件的 XML 編碼。

trans-unit.source: Reconstructs a security object with a specified state from an XML encoding.
trans-unit.target: 透過 XML 編碼，重新建構具有指定狀態的安全性物件。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="securityElement" /> parameter is not a valid permission element.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="securityElement" /> 參數不是有效的使用權限項目。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The version number of the <paramref name="securityElement" /> parameter is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援 <paramref name="securityElement" /> 參數的版本號碼。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="securityElement" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="securityElement" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBaseEntry" /> objects added to this permission.
trans-unit.target: 傳回已加入至這個使用權限的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBaseEntry" /> 物件陣列。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBaseEntry" /> objects that were added to this permission.
trans-unit.target: 已加入至這個使用權限的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBaseEntry" /> 物件陣列。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBase.AddPermissionAccess%2A> and <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBase.RemovePermissionAccess%2A> to add and remove permission entries to this permission.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBase.AddPermissionAccess%2A>和<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBase.RemovePermissionAccess%2A>新增和移除這個權限的權限項目。

trans-unit.source: A permission object of the same type as the current permission object.
trans-unit.target: 與目前使用權限物件相同型別的使用權限物件。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a permission object that is the intersection of the current permission object and a target permission object.
trans-unit.target: 建立並傳回目前使用權限物件和目標使用權限物件交集的使用權限物件。

trans-unit.source: A new permission object that represents the intersection of the current object and the specified target.
trans-unit.target: 新使用權限物件，表示目前物件和指定目標的交集。

trans-unit.source: This object is <see langword="null" /> if the intersection is empty.
trans-unit.target: 如果交集是空的，則這個物件是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The intersection of two permission objects is a permission that describes the set of operations they both hold in common.
trans-unit.target: 兩個權限物件的交集會描述一組都保留在一般作業的權限。

trans-unit.source: Specifically, it represents the minimum permissions required for a demand to pass both permissions.
trans-unit.target: 具體來說，它代表要傳遞這兩個權限的要求所需的最低權限。

trans-unit.source: The target permission object is not of the same type as the current permission object.
trans-unit.target: 與目前使用權限物件不同型別的目標使用權限物件。

trans-unit.source: A permission object that is to be tested for the subset relationship.
trans-unit.target: 將測試子集關聯性 (Relationship) 的使用權限物件。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current permission object is a subset of the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 判斷目前使用權限物件是否為指定使用權限的子集。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current permission object is a subset of the specified permission object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前使用權限物件是指定使用權限物件的子集則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The current permission object is a subset of the specified permission object if the current permission object specifies a set of operations that is wholly contained by the specified permission object.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前權限物件指定一組完全指定權限物件所包含的作業，目前的權限物件是指定權限物件的子集。

trans-unit.source: For example, a permission that represents access to C:\Example.txt is a subset of a permission that represents access to C:\\.
trans-unit.target: 例如，表示 C:\Example.txt 的存取權限是到 c： 代表存取權限的子集\\。

trans-unit.source: If this method returns `true`, the current permission object represents no more access to the protected resource than does the specified permission object.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法傳回`true`，目前的權限物件，表示沒有存取受保護的資源比指定的權限物件。

trans-unit.source: This method always returns `false` when the specified permission object is of a different type than that of the current permission object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法一律會傳回`false`時的類型不同於目前權限物件的指定權限物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the permission is unrestricted.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示使用權限是否不受限制。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if permission is unrestricted; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用權限不受限制，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: An unrestricted permission object represents access to any and all resources protected by the permission.
trans-unit.target: 不受限制的權限物件代表的存取權限所保護的所有資源。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the character to be used to represent a local reference.
trans-unit.target: 指定用來表示區域參考的字元。

trans-unit.source: The value of this field is ".".
trans-unit.target: 此欄位的值是"。"。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an enumeration value that describes the types of access that you are giving the resource.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定一個列舉值，以描述對資源您所授與的存取權類型。

trans-unit.source: An enumeration value that is derived from <see cref="T:System.Type" /> and describes the types of access that you are giving the resource.
trans-unit.target: 由 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 衍生的列舉值，描述對資源您所授與的存取權類型。

trans-unit.source: The property value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 屬性值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The property value is not an enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: 屬性值不是有效的列舉值。

trans-unit.source: When you inherit from <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBase" />, you must set this property.
trans-unit.target: 當您繼承自<see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBase" />，您必須設定這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: For an example of an implementation of this class, see <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterPermission" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需此類別的實作的範例，請參閱<see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterPermission" />。

trans-unit.source: In <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterPermission" />, the <see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBase.PermissionAccessType" /> property is privately set to the type of <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterPermissionAccess" />.
trans-unit.target: 在<see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterPermission" />、<see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBase.PermissionAccessType" />屬性公開設定的型別<see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterPermissionAccess" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBaseEntry" /> to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBaseEntry" />。

trans-unit.source: Removes a permission entry from the permission.
trans-unit.target: 從使用權限中移除使用權限項目。

trans-unit.source: The specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBaseEntry" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBaseEntry" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in the <see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBaseEntry.PermissionAccessPath" /> property is not equal to the number of elements in the <see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBase.TagNames" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBaseEntry.PermissionAccessPath" /> 屬性中的項目數目不等於 <see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBase.TagNames" /> 屬性中的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBaseEntry" /> is not in the permission.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBaseEntry" /> 不在使用權限中。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an array of strings that identify the resource you are protecting.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定一個字串陣列，以辨識您要保護的資源。

trans-unit.source: An array of strings that identify the resource you are trying to protect.
trans-unit.target: 字串陣列，辨識您要保護的資源。

trans-unit.source: The property value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 屬性值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The length of the array is 0.
trans-unit.target: 陣列的長度為零。

trans-unit.source: When you inherit from <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBase" />, you must set this property.
trans-unit.target: 當您繼承自<see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBase" />，您必須設定這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: For an example of an implementation of this class, see <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterPermission" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需此類別的實作的範例，請參閱<see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterPermission" />。

trans-unit.source: In <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterPermission" />, the <see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBase.TagNames" /> property is set privately to "Machine" and "Category".
trans-unit.target: 在<see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterPermission" />、<see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBase.TagNames" />屬性私下設為 「 機器 」 和 「 類別目錄 」。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an XML encoding of the security object and its current state.
trans-unit.target: 建立並傳回安全性物件的 XML 編碼方式和目前狀態。

trans-unit.source: An XML encoding of the security object, including any state information.
trans-unit.target: 安全物件的 XML 編碼方式，包含所有狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: A permission object to combine with the current permission object.
trans-unit.target: 與目前使用權限物件結合的使用權限物件。

trans-unit.source: It must be of the same type as the current permission object.
trans-unit.target: 它必須與目前的使用權限物件為相同的型別。

trans-unit.source: Creates a permission object that combines the current permission object and the target permission object.
trans-unit.target: 建立將目前使用權限物件和目標使用權限物件相結合的使用權限物件。

trans-unit.source: A new permission object that represents the union of the current permission object and the specified permission object.
trans-unit.target: 新使用權限物件，表示目前使用權限物件和指定使用權限物件的聯集。

trans-unit.source: The result of a call to <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBase.Union%2A> is a permission that represents all the operations represented by both the current permission object and the specified permission object.
trans-unit.target: 若要呼叫的結果<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ResourcePermissionBase.Union%2A>是代表目前權限物件和指定的權限物件所代表的所有作業的權限。

trans-unit.source: Any demand that passes either permission passes their union.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞其中一個權限的任何要求會傳遞它們的聯集。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="target" /> permission object is not of the same type as the current permission object.
trans-unit.target: 與目前使用權限物件不同型別的 <paramref name="target" /> 使用權限物件。
